title: Performance assessment of VSC-based HVDC system in asynchronous grid interconnection: Offline and real-time validation of control design with symmetric optimum PI tuning
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Adesh Kumar Mishra, Saurabh Mani Tripathi, Omveer Singh, Ankit Kumar Srivastava, Thiyagarajan Venkatraman, Raghavendra Rajan Vijayaraghavan, Sachin Kumar, Rajvikram Madurai Elavarasan, Lucian Mihet-Popa
